info.title: USDA
info.description: United States Government Data and API.

get.description: Retrieves a paged collection of amber waves content nodes, sorted by descending release date.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: An integer parameter that specifies the desired page size. (FromUri)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: A zero-index integer parameter that specifies the desired starting index (0 for page 1, 100 for page 2, etc...) (FromUri)

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: A string parameter that specifies a series alias used for filtering. (FromUri)

parameters.name: getCount
parameters.description: A boolean parameter that indicates to return a count. Specifying a false value will return zero. (FromUri)

get.description: Retrieves the first 100 amber waves content nodes, sorted by descending release date.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An integer parameter that specifies the ID of the node returned. (FromUri)

get.description: Retrieves a single chart content node.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An integer parameter that specifies the ID of the node returned. (FromUri)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: An integer parameter that specifies the desired page size. (FromUri)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: A zero-index integer parameter that specifies the desired starting index (0 for page 1, 10 for page 2, etc...) (FromUri)

parameters.name: getCount
parameters.description: A boolean parameter that indicates to return a count. Specifying a false value will return zero. (FromUri)

get.description: Retrieves a total count of all topic nodes.

parameters.name: getCount
parameters.description: getCount: A boolean parameter that indicates to return a count. Specifying a false value will return zero. (FromUri)

parameters.name: getChildren
parameters.description: A boolean parameter that specifies to return child nodes. When [true], child nodes are returned. When [false], the parent specified parent node is returned. (FromUri)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An integer parameter that specifies the ID of the partent topic node for which child nodes are returned. (FromUri)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: An integer parameter that specifies the desired page size. (FromUri)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: A zero-index integer parameter that specifies the desired starting index (0 for page 1, 10 for page 2, etc...) (FromUri)
